title: Kannukulle Lyrics Singam 2 Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kannukulle
Singer: Javed Ali, Priya Himesh, Rap: David Simon
Movie: Singam 2
Lyrics: Viveka
Music: Devi Sri Prasad

 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Boys and Girls wanna
get up and dance common
raise your glass and say
whats up whats up whats up

scream and shout maama..
let it out loud mama
bring the roof down mama
whats up whats up whats up..

Un kannukulla gun-na vachi
enna sudaadha
un kaaki satta kaalarathaan
thooki vidaadha

Adi onnaam classu ponna pola
romba pannaadha
unnathaaney thaedi vandhen
thalli odaadha

Yen pattaampoochi kitta vandhu
thita mittu vattamittu paathu rasi
kattam katta aasa padaadha

Ye dettol oothi sutham senja
vennilaa ninnukittu enna inga
yedhum seiyaadha
Hey aayiram aayasa vachiirundhum
enna vaatuna

Un kannukulla gun-na vachi
enna sudaadha
un kaaki satta kaalarathaan
thooki vidaadha

Boys and Girls wanna
get up and dance common
raise your glass and say
whats up whats up whats up ..

Ne vetkathula sirichaale
western music-ku
verum kaalil nadandhaaley
luck-u boomikku

Ne dhoorathila irundhaale
kaaichal menikku
Arugae nee vandhaaley
energy tonic-ku

Na parataara computer-a maariponeney
un kai patta immediate-a restart aaveney
ye strawbery baby-a robbery panna paakura

Un kannukulla gun-na vachi
enna sudaadha
un kaaki satta kaalarathaan
thooki vidaadha

Ye ekka chakka azhagoda thiriyum salvaarey
unnakaaga varalam-de moondram world war-e

Ada dada unnudaya nadipukku
tharalaam oscar-ey
nee vaikum ice-il marandhaen yen perey

Nee mooku mela kova patta kannam sevakkum
adhil vanavillil varum ellam vannam irukkum

Un kannukulla gun-na vachi
enna sudaadha
un kaaki satta kaalarathaan
thooki vidaadha

English Translation
I tried my best :)
